caption.title: Modelled potential distribution of beech forests on calcareous soils in Europe (green colour) under current climatic conditions (left panel).
caption.p: I.e., For the SRES A2 scenario, we computed a potential distribution of 7.2 million ha in the year 2080 (right panel), i.e., a reduction to 22% of the current distribution. Made with Natural Earth under CC0 license.
